W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_01_000_DETAIL.text: Yellow Division is in charge of investigating other civilizations. You wonder what awaits you here.

W10_LDMK_COMM_M_KAIGI_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_LDMK_COMM_M_KAIGI_000_DETAIL.text: A place where people of different divisions can gather to discuss important matters—or unimportant ones.

W10_LDMK_COMM_A_ROOM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_LDMK_COMM_A_ROOM_000_DETAIL.text: The area where the members of Yellow Division live.

W10_LDMK_COMM_B_ROOM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_LDMK_COMM_B_ROOM_000_DETAIL.text: The area where the members of Red Division live.

W10_LDMK_COMM_C_ROOM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_LDMK_COMM_C_ROOM_000_DETAIL.text: The area where the members of Green Division live.

W10_LDMK_COMM_A_BUNMEI_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_LDMK_COMM_A_BUNMEI_000_DETAIL.text: Yellow Division researches the cultures of other worlds here.

W10_LDMK_COMM_B_MAG2_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_LDMK_COMM_B_MAG2_000_DETAIL.text: Red Division breeds monsters and researches relics here.

W10_LDMK_COMM_C_HOSPITAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_LDMK_COMM_C_HOSPITAL_000_DETAIL.text: A place for treating various illnesses.

W10_LDMK_COMM_B_MAG_SHITA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_LDMK_COMM_B_MAG_SHITA_000_DETAIL.text: A laboratory for researching hidden relics.

W10_LDMK_COMM_C_REITOU_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_LDMK_COMM_C_REITOU_000_DETAIL.text: Both people and research subjects sleep here.

W10_LDMK_COMM_HATSUMEIBU_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_LDMK_COMM_HATSUMEIBU_000_DETAIL.text: This looks to be a place where automated machines help to develop new inventions.

W10_LDMK_COMM_TEST_CONTENA1_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_LDMK_COMM_TEST_CONTENA1_000_DETAIL.text: You don't know if there's anything inside.

W10_LDMK_COMM_GUS_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_LDMK_COMM_GUS_000_DETAIL.text: This tank is full of gas. You're not sure what Green Division intends to use it for.

W10_EVAR_COMM_ELV_X_MOVE_MAIN_002_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_ELV_X_MOVE_MAIN_002_DETAIL.text: This will take you to the disposal area.

W10_EVAR_COMM_ELV_X_MOVE_MAIN_004_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_ELV_X_MOVE_MAIN_004_DETAIL.text: This will take you to the disposal area.

W10_EVAR_COMM_ELV_X_MOVE_MAIN_005_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_ELV_X_MOVE_MAIN_005_DETAIL.text: This will take you to the disposal area.

W10_EVAR_COMM_ELV_X_MOVE_MAIN_006_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_ELV_X_MOVE_MAIN_006_DETAIL.text: This will take you to the disposal area.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_00UP_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_00UP_000_DETAIL.text: A giant lift in the center of Delta Base.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_00_DW_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_00_DW_000_DETAIL.text: You can use this lift to move around.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_A_UP_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_A_UP_000_DETAIL.text: Artifacts from civilizations of various worlds are stored haphazardly on the lower level.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_CLT_NIS_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_CLT_NIS_000_DETAI.text: This lift would ordinarily take you to the lower level, but it's not working right now.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_A_DW_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_A_DW_000_DETAIL.text: This will take you to the upper level.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_B_UP_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_B_UP_000_DETAIL.text: Data and specimens of monsters from various other worlds are being stored on the lower level.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_MAG_NIS_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_MAG_NIS_000_DETAI.text: This lift would ordinarily take you to the lower level, but it's not working right now.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_B_DW_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_B_DW_000_DETAIL.text: This will take you to the upper level.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_C_UP_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_C_UP_000_DETAIL.text: Samples of various life-forms from other worlds are being stored on the lower level.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_LIF_NIS_000_DETAI.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_LIF_NIS_000_DETAI.text: This lift would ordinarily take you to the lower level, but it's not working right now.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_C_DW_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MAZE_ELV_C_DW_000_DETAIL.text: This will take you to the upper level.

W10_GIMK_COMM_EV_ITA_02_KYE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_EV_ITA_02_KYE_000_DETAIL.text: You can use this lift to get around.

W10_GIMK_COMM_EV_ITA_04_KYE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_EV_ITA_04_KYE_000_DETAIL.text: You can use this lift to get around.

W10_GIMK_COMM_EV_ITA_05_KYE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_EV_ITA_05_KYE_000_DETAIL.text: You can use this lift to get around.

W10_GIMK_COMM_EV_ITA_06_KYE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_EV_ITA_06_KYE_000_DETAIL.text: You can use this lift to get around.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_MISSON_0100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_MISSON_0100_DETAIL.text: You don't know if there's anything inside.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_01_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_01_001_DETAIL.text: A lift for the exclusive use of Red Division. It connects their area with the lower level.

W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_01_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_01_001_DETAIL.text: A lift for the exclusive use of Yellow Division. It connects their area with the lower level.

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_01_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_01_001_DETAIL.text: A lift for the exclusive use of Green Division. It connects their area with the lower level.

W10_GIMK_COMM_ALERT_C01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_ALERT_C01_DETAIL.text: This device looks capable of emitting a sound, but you have no idea what it will be.

W10_EVAR_COMM_SwitchA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_SwitchA_000_DETAIL.text: This control panel will let you operate all three moving platforms on the lower level at once.

W10_EVAR_COMM_SwitchA_CLT_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_SwitchA_CLT_DETAIL.text: This control panel will let you operate all three moving platforms on the lower level at once. You'll need to use it to reach the control terminal.

W10_EVAR_COMM_HATUMEI_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_HATUMEI_000_DETAIL.text: There are various tools here. You could probably make something if you gathered the right materials.

W10_EVAR_COMM_HATUMEI_EGG_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_HATUMEI_EGG_001_DETAIL.text: If you have an egg, you can incubate it here—though what will emerge is anyone's guess.

W10_EVAR_COMM_HATUMEI_SEED_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_HATUMEI_SEED_001_DETAIL.text: You can cultivate any seeds you have here. You wonder what will grow from them.

W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_LIF_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_LIF_000_DETAIL.text: This researcher would like to talk to you.

W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_CLT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_CLT_000_DETAIL.text: This researcher would like to talk to you.

W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_MAG_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_MAG_000_DETAIL.text: This researcher would like to talk to you.

W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_BOOK_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_BOOK_000_DETAIL.text: This person seems to have an interest in the cursed tome page you found.

W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_KATANA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_KATANA_000_DETAIL.text: This person seems to have an interest in the mysterious sword fragment (?) you found.

W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_STONE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_TREADE_STONE_000_DETAIL.text: This person seems to have an interest in the philosopher's stone fragment (?) you found.

W10_GIMK_COMM_ELEC_A01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_ELEC_A01_DETAIL.text: This serves as a form of security against both intruders and monsters.

W10_COMM_MAG_UDETAMESHI_00_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_COMM_MAG_UDETAMESHI_00_000_DETAIL.text: An experiment that Red Division's researchers are carrying out in secret.

W10_EVAR_COMM_INTERMISSION_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_INTERMISSION_000_DETAIL.text: Administrator Gold has been assigned as your monitor. You don't know whether he is currently irritated.

W10_EVAR_COMM_INTERMISSION_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_INTERMISSION_010_DETAIL.text: Administrator Gold has been assigned as your monitor, and is still waiting for you. You don't know if he is patient or not.

W10_EVAR_COMM_INTERMISSION_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_INTERMISSION_020_DETAIL.text: Administrator Gold has been assigned as your monitor, and is still waiting for you. You don't know if he is extremely patient or not.

W10_EVAR_COMM_INTERMISSION_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_INTERMISSION_030_DETAIL.text: Administrator Gold has been assigned as your monitor, and is still waiting for you. You wonder whether he will run out of patience at some point.

W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_01_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_01_100_DETAIL.text: The Yellow Division members who were investigating the cursed text were all successfully rescued. Perhaps Bean is almost done getting ready to interview you.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MAN_A01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MAN_A01_DETAIL.text: This appears to be the person you're looking for. They're reading a book.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MAN_A02_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MAN_A02_DETAIL.text: This appears to be the person you're looking for. They're reading a book.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MAN_A03_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MAN_A03_DETAIL.text: This appears to be the person you're looking for. They're reading a book.

W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_04_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_04_000_DETAIL.text: This person seems to have an interest in the triangular scrap of paper you retrieved from the Red Division's container.

W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_04_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_04_010_DETAIL.text: A strange book called the Necronomicon. Do you want to return its missing page?

W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_05_0101st_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_05_0101st_DETAIL.text: They're hard at work analyzing the sword.

W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_05_0103rd_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_05_0103rd_DETAIL.text: Perhaps they've finished analyzing the sword?

W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_05_090_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_05_090_DETAIL.text: Will it be possible to restore the sword from its shattered fragments?

W10_GIMK_COMM_CLT_05_MON_01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_CLT_05_MON_01_DETAIL.text: This monster was attracted to the sword. You can't let it interfere with the analysis team.

W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_07_000_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_07_000_000_DETAIL.text: Yellow Division appears to be readying a new experiment.

W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_07_010_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_07_010_000_DETAIL.text: You've been asked to assist Yellow Division in a strange experiment involving a skeletal specimen.

W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_08_040_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_08_040_000_DETAIL.text: Perhaps you should say goodbye to Bean before leaving Delta Base.

W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_08_050_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_08_050_DETAIL.text: This terminal will let you separate Yellow Division's area from Delta Base's information network.

W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_08_080_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_CLT_08_080_DETAIL.text: You've successfully separated Yellow Division's area from Delta Base's information networks. Now you just need to subdue the skeletal specimen. Hopefully Bean is managing to hold out.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_01_000_DETAIL.text: Red Division is responsible for researching monsters. You wonder what awaits you here.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_01_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_01_100_DETAIL.text: You should deliver the biochip you recovered to the overseer.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_056_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_056_000_DETAIL.text: The overseer of Red Division is apparently dying to meet you. You wonder why.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_056_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_056_010_DETAIL.text: This monster is your target. Defeat it and acquire its data.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_056_999_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_056_999_DETAIL.text: This isn't the monster you're after.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_098_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_098_010_DETAIL.text: This monster is your target. Defeat it and acquire its data.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_098_999_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_098_999_DETAIL.text: This isn't the monster you're after.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_507_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_507_010_DETAIL.text: This monster is your target. Defeat it and acquire its data.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_507_999_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_507_999_DETAIL.text: This isn't the monster you're after.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_440_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_440_000_DETAIL.text: Red Division appears to have another problem on their hands. Perhaps you should help them.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_440_002_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_440_002_DETAIL.text: Claiming to be short on workers, Red Division has requested your help. Perhaps you should aid them?

W10_GIMK_COMM_MAG_440_MON_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MAG_440_MON_DETAIL.text: It's time to get the slime mold under control.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_440_081_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_440_081_DETAIL.text: This device can disable the electromagnetic gate.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MAN_C4401_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MAN_C4401_DETAIL.text: They seem to be struggling to keep the slime mold in check.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_000_DETAIL.text: The overseer says he's just seeking combat data, but can you really trust him?

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_020_DETAIL.text: You wonder how Red Division is doing since losing their overseer.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_056_440_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_056_440_DETAIL.text: You should probably defeat this before it's absorbed by the Beast King.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_098_440_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_098_440_DETAIL.text: You should probably defeat this before it's absorbed by the Beast King.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_507_440_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_507_440_DETAIL.text: You should probably defeat this before it's absorbed by the Beast King.

W10_GIMK_COMM_ELEC_4404_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_ELEC_4404_DETAIL.text: You'll need to reach the other side of the electromagnetic gate in order to face off against the Beast King. Is now the right time?

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_030_TITLE.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_030_TITLE.text: Final Battle with the Beast King

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_030_DETAIL.text: You wonder what's inside that combat suit. Is it just a mass of slime mold, or something else entirely?

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_060_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_060_DETAIL.text: A monster has escaped its cage. Green Division may be willing to produce some gas to subdue it.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_070_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_070_DETAIL.text: Green Division's gas is apparently ready.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_005_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_005_DETAIL.text: The slime mold is still seeking the sword, so you decided to ask Yellow Division for help.

W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_011_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_MAG_END_011_DETAIL.text: You wonder why the slime mold wants the mysterious sword Yellow Division is currently looking after.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MON_KATANA_01_TITLE.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MON_KATANA_01_TITLE.text: The Slime Mold Seeks the Sword

W10_GIMK_COMM_MON_KATANA_01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MON_KATANA_01_DETAIL.text: You must defeat the slime mold before it obtains the sword.

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_00_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_00_001_DETAIL.text: Green Division is responsible for investigating life. You wonder what awaits you here.

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_01_000_DETAIL.text: You find a Green Division researcher. She looks to be in some kind of trouble, so you aren't sure whether it's okay to talk to her or not.

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_01_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_01_100_DETAIL.text: You managed to recover Schrö and Dinger. You wonder if you'll receive some kind of reward for this.

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_04_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_04_000_DETAIL.text: These people seem to have an interest in your belongings.

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_04_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_04_010_DETAIL.text: Both people and research subjects sleep here.

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_04_021_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_04_021_DETAIL.text: You should ask what happened in the cryosleep area while feigning ignorance.

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_04_031_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_04_031_DETAIL.text: Could the person standing in front of the Connectivity Gate be who you're looking for?

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_05_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_05_000_DETAIL.text: You find a Green Division researcher. She looks very scared, so you aren't sure whether it's okay to talk to her or not.

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_05_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_05_100_DETAIL.text: You were told these are otherworldly vegetables, but they look more like monsters.

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_05_400_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_05_400_DETAIL.text: You've dealt with the excessive number of monophids. You wonder if you'll receive a reward for this.

W10_GIMK_COMM_CAT_C01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_CAT_C01_DETAIL.text: Is this a quantum cat, or a monster pretending to be one? Pay attention to the direction its head is facing!

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_06_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_06_000_DETAIL.text: You find a Green Division researcher. She looks very busy, so you aren't sure whether it's okay to talk to her or not.

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_06_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_06_100_DETAIL.text: This looks to be a tsuchinoko. Is it asleep?

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_06_400_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_06_400_DETAIL.text: You successfully captured all of the illusive tsuchinoko. You wonder if you will receive a reward for this.

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_07_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_07_000_DETAIL.text: Green Division appears to be readying a new experiment.

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_07_015_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_07_015_DETAIL.text: You've been invited to witness Green Division's latest experiment.

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_08_300_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_08_300_DETAIL.text: Delta Base no longer needs to live in fear of becoming a nest for Rogue Species 303.

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_08_300_BUTTON.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_08_300_BUTTON.text: Report to the Overseer of Green Division

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_08_400_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_08_400_DETAIL.text: Green Division has apparently acquired some new information.

W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_08_011_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_LIF_08_011_DETAIL.text: Red Division is knowledgeable in the field of monsters, so you decided to ask for their help in dealing with the fused life-form that is Rogue Species 303.

W10_GIMK_COMM_MON_LEND001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_COMM_MON_LEND001_DETAIL.text: A group of Rogue Species 303 are here.

W10_EVAR_COMM_OLD_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_OLD_000_DETAIL.text: Who is this person, and where are they from?

W10_EVAR_COMM_OLD_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_OLD_001_DETAIL.text: Perhaps the captured alien left this behind?

W10_LDMK_COMM_TEST_TENSOU01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_LDMK_COMM_TEST_TENSOU01_000_DETAIL.text: This door leads to other worlds.

W10_EVAR_COMM_TENSO_00_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_COMM_TENSO_00_000_DETAIL.text: This device connects the base with other worlds.
